decks.notes: This Modern 1 vs 1 deck focuses on utilizing the Ruby Storm archetype to quickly generate mana and cast spells, ultimately leading to a game-winning combo. The key strategy involves casting rituals and other spells to generate ample red mana, utilizing cards like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Glimpse the Impossible to draw cards and maintain momentum. The deck also includes ways to recur spells from the graveyard, such as Past in Flames, to continue the combo. With careful planning and sequencing, this deck can overwhelm opponents with its explosive plays and win conditions.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Underworld Breach card along with various combo pieces such as Twiddle, Consign to Memory, and Wish to generate a powerful engine that allows for repetitive use of powerful spells like The One Ring and Consign to Memory. The deck includes mana ramp cards like Lotus Field and Expedition Map to facilitate this strategy, as well as card draw and manipulation spells like Preordain and Consider. Vizier of Tumbling Sands helps untap key lands and generate more mana to support the combo, allowing for a quick and explosive victory.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and disruption to overpower the opponent quickly. Utilizing creatures like Amped Raptor and Orcish Bowmasters alongside spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thoughtseize, the deck aims to control the board and deal significant damage early on. With the addition of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion, the deck gains an extra level of consistency in its mana base. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to maintain aggressive pressure while disrupting the opponent's game plan to secure a swift victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage quickly to the opponent. It also includes disruptive elements like Blood Moon and Static Prison to control the game and slow down the opponent. The Companion, Jegantha, the Wellspring, provides additional synergy and allows for consistent mana acceleration. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, efficient threats and disrupt their game plan to secure a swift victory.

The main focus of this Mardu Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. With a mix of low-cost creatures and spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize to control the board, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero. Key cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Goblin Bombardment provide additional sources of damage and disruption, while the companion Jegantha, the Wellspring adds consistency and flexibility to the deck's mana base. Overall, this deck is designed to apply constant pressure and win the game through quick and aggressive plays.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of disruption, removal, and powerful creatures to control the game and outvalue the opponent. By using cards like Fatal Push, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Grief to disrupt the opponent's game plan, along with powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Boggart Trawler to apply pressure and generate advantage, the deck aims to grind the opponent out and secure victory. The inclusion of cards like Necrodominance and Fell the Profane provide additional ways to interact with the opponent's board and further cement the control aspect of the deck.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and efficient removal to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes a combination of low-cost creatures with abilities that can generate value, backed up by removal spells to clear the way for attacks. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Static Prison to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is designed to support the three-color mana requirements of the deck while also providing access to powerful dual lands. This deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain control throughout the game.

The main idea of this Eldrazi Control deck is to use powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker to control the game and overwhelm your opponent. The deck also includes various spells and enchantments to support this strategy, such as Kozilek's Return, Malevolent Rumble, and Sowing Mycospawn. By utilizing cards like Ancient Stirrings and Ugin's Labyrinth to search for key pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan, this deck aims to dominate the battlefield and secure victory through immense Eldrazi power.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing counterspells, removal, and card advantage to prevent the opponent from enacting their game plan. The deck includes a variety of instant-speed spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy, as well as powerful creatures like Snapcaster Mage to provide additional value. The mana base is optimized to support the deck's game plan by providing the necessary colors of mana for spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge. This deck aims to outlast the opponent and ultimately secure victory through resource management and efficient plays.

The focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently reanimate powerful creatures using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Atraxa, Grand Unifier while disrupting opponents with cards like Thoughtseize and Prismatic Ending. The combination of instant speed reanimation and disruptive spells allows the deck to quickly assemble a powerful board state and overwhelm the opponent before they can react. The deck also features tools to protect its key combo pieces and control the board, making it a versatile and resilient combo deck in the Modern format.

The Boros Aggro deck focuses on utilizing a mix of cheap, aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By playing creatures like Guide of Souls and Amped Raptor alongside spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of powerful cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer helps to maintain pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the deck utilizes cards like Static Prison and Blood Moon to disrupt the opponent's strategy and control the board.
